version_description: - Minor bug fixes and improvements

All work and no play is no fun. Play the all new: TOYS AND GAMES

- Minor bug fixes and improvements

Dig in and leave room for seconds. Play the all new event: WORLD ON YOUR PLATE!

-Minor bug fixes and improvements

Trick or treat! Play the scary all new Halloween event: HORROR WEEK

-Minor bug fixes and improvements

It's the time of the year to FEAST! Play the special Thanksgiving event!

-Bug fix:
--- Auto removal of the expired games

Congrats! You're on Santa's nice list this year. In the latest update, we have given Draw Something a brand new look. We have also applied some under-the-hood fixes to help load the app in a snap. While we all wait for Santa, why not update and Draw Something!

Congrats! You're on Santa's nice list this year. In the latest update, we have given Draw Something a brand new look. We have also applied some under-the-hood fixes to help load the app in a snap. While we all wait for Santa, why not update and Draw Something!

Draw Something just became friendlier.
In our latest update, we have made it easier for you to invite your friends from Facebook.
We have also applied some under-the-hood fixes to keep your game running smoothly.
Update to enjoy a better experience.

Draw Something is moving onwards and upwards!
In our latest update, our worker bees have made a number of small upgrades that will greatly improve your experience.
Update and enjoy!

Draw Something is moving onwards and upwards!
In our latest update, our worker bees have made a number of small upgrades that will greatly improve your experience.
Update and enjoy!

Draw Something is in the mood for love!
We have applied some special ingredients to keep your game running smoothly.
Connect and embrace the season of romance now.
We have applied some under-the-hood fixes to keep your game running smoothly. Update now and turn on the music!

With great things on the horizon, we've made some fixes and stability improvements to your game.
Update and enjoy now!

Get started on Draw Something in an exciting way with a whole new challenge!
With some screen layout improvements and bug fixes, update and experience the fun to be had firsthand!

Get more social with Draw Something!
There's more fun to be had from drawing with your friends! Connect with them and enjoy the flawless drawing experience.

Spring is in the air! It's the perfect time of the year to put your colors to work.
We've made it easier for you to express yourself, to connect to your friends and to make new ones.
So, update now!

We've upgraded with the newest in the field to welcome our IPhone X players into the fold, whether new or old.
So pick up your pencil and update now!.

We've upgraded to welcome our iPhone X artists into the fold.
Update now, pick up your pencil and draw something cool.

Get creative with our new update from Draw Something. We have made your drawing experience smoother with sharper strokes and stable brushes.
New users get a practice round to get their brush strokes on point before they paint a masterpiece for others.

Get creative with our new update from Draw Something. We have made your drawing experience smoother with sharper strokes and stable brushes.
New users get a practice round to get their brush strokes on point before they paint a masterpiece for others.

The best artists deserve the grandest stage!
Come visit our new and renovated Events Gallery and win rewards galore!

With some under-the-hood fixes and an improved sign in flow, Draw Something is now ready for a smoother drawing and guessing experience than ever before.
So, update now!

Celebrate a world full of colors with Draw Something!
Get ready for a splash of shades to brighten up the greys as you draw and guess with your friends!
We've made a number of fixes and improvements to make your experience with Draw Something even more fun and vibrant!
So, update now!

Explore our weekly themed events! Draw from the special word lists and earn great rewards. Your work could even feature in future events.
There's even more fun to be had from sharing your drawings with your friends.
So, update now!

Welcome to your new personal Draw Something profile!
Now, know more about the friends you play with, compare your skills and streaks with them, and keep track of your drawings.
Connect more with your friends and drawings than ever before with the new update from Draw Something!

So, update now!

We've also improved our sharing capabilities so that you can show off your skills with your friends.
So, update now, and use your ink to its fullest!

Explore a world made more colorful with Draw Something!
With several performance improvements in the game, get ready to draw and guess faster with your friends.
For millions of players like you, there has never been a better time to pick up the pencil and start drawing.
So, update now!

Soak in some summer sunshine with Draw Something!
We have added some special ingredients to make your experience as cool as possible.
So, update now!

Join a world of colorful people with Draw Something!
Now earn double the rewards with recommended games.
Pack more of Draw Something into your day, thanks to our under-the-hood performance improvements and bug fixes, leading to a smoother experience.
So, update now!

Get ready to Draw Something New!
Take advantage of a faster and smoother experience than ever before for all our new and old players.
We have now expanded our library of words so that you can never run out of possibilities to draw.
Don't want to sign in with Facebook or Email anymore?
Now you can play instantly without logging in.
So, update now.

Draw more, Guess more, and Win more!
Unlock exciting rewards now with our daily login bonuses!
If you are eager for competition, finding quick games are easier than ever before.
Packed with an even better experience for our new players and a more rewarding one for those returning, there has never been a better time to play.
So, update now!

Drawing and Guessing is more fun than ever!
We have made it easier to start a game with your friends and to make new ones by sharing your username.
Our overall game experience has gotten even faster and stronger thanks to some special fixes.
So, update now!

With some under-the-hood fixes and an improved sign in flow, Draw Something is now ready for a smoother drawing and guessing experience than ever before.
So, update now!

Draw Something is the perfect place for your seasonal festivities!
With months of fun ahead, there’s no better time to take advantage of the quality of life improvements we’ve made to your experience.

New Word Packs available every week!
Draw and guess all day with endlessly exciting word options!
Gain new packs of words with every new week and never run out of words to draw for your friends.
So, update now!

Bring some color into this winter!
Have the best drawing experience possible.
We've added some some special fixes.
So expect a faster and stronger game.
Update now!

We've made a number of fixes to improve your experience as well, fitting with the spirit of giving.
Happy drawing and guessing!
Update now!
